QuestData.Title: Every Bit Counts
QuestData.Description: The Jorune Mine, west of here, needs your help!$B$BMy good friend Ageilaa sent me to look for help. Exarch Maladaar sent over what vindicators he could spare, but it isn't enough!$B$BWill you go to the mine and help us? We need the crystals from the mine to create more defenses like the crystals you see on the Burning Front.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ageilaa at the Jorune Mine in Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: Aeun sent you? Help has arrived!
